Simple RESTful API with Django
==============================

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://192.168.0.35:8000/message -d "{\"group_id\":982129,\"sender_id\":\"selling RM-023 for 600k USD\", \"sender_name\":\"watches_sg_friends\",\"is_reply\":true,\"user_id\":\"1234\", \"message_id\":\"123\",\"message_timestamp\":\"1644201669\",\"message\":\"selling RM-023 for 600k USD\", \"image_url\":\"https://mmg.whatsapp.net/d/f/AtpAaO1Q4J-iRwtPHsqBxWJ1m9mCgNTX3eFKF_dPIt8y.enc\",\"image_mimetype\":\"image/jpeg\",\"image_height\":\"531\", \"image_width\":\"621\",\"jpeg_thumbnail\":\"\",\"reply_message_id\":\"456\",\"reply_message_sender_id\":\"123\",\"reply_message_quote\":\"hello\"}"


curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://192.168.0.35:8000/message -d "{\"group_id\":982129,\"sender_id\":\"selling RM-023 for 600k USD\", \"sender_name\":\"watches_sg_friends\",\"is_reply\":true,\"user_id\":\"1234\", \"message_id\":\"123\",\"message_timestamp\":\"1644201669\",\"message\":\"selling RM-023 for 600k USD\", \"image_url\":\"\",\"image_mimetype\":\"\",\"image_height\":\"531\", \"image_width\":\"621\",\"jpeg_thumbnail\":\"\",\"reply_message_id\":\"456\",\"reply_message_sender_id\":\"123\",\"reply_message_quote\":\"hello\"}"
